name: For Loop
description: Iterate over outer dimensions, processing each slice independently. Unpacks dimensions for element-wise processing.

inputs.name: Data Input
inputs.description: Input data with batch dimensions to iterate over

outputs.name: Loop Body
outputs.description: Single slice for processing (batch dimensions removed)

parameters.name: Iterate Dimensions
parameters.description: Number of outer dimensions to iterate over

parameters.name: Dimension Names
parameters.description: Comma-separated names for iterated dimensions (e.g., 'n_participants, n_sessions')
